summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's activities on August 9, 2019, the day before his death. It documents a social phone call Epstein made to his mother, arranged after he agreed to shorten his attorney visitation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The incarcerated individual at Metropolitan Correctional Center who is documented making a social phone call to his mother on August 9, 2019, after agreeing to shorten his attorney visitation.

events.title: Epstein's Social Phone Call
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein made a social phone call to his mother from the Special Housing Unit shower area at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. The call was arranged after he agreed to shorten his attorney visitation and lasted approximately 15 minutes.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document records Jeffrey Epstein's activities on August 9, 2019, the day before he was found dead in his cell.
Epstein made a social phone call to his mother, using a number starting with area code 347.
Epstein agreed to shorten his attorney visitation in order to make this social call.
The call was made from a phone placed in the shower area on (G) Tier of the Special Housing Unit and lasted 15 minutes.
The memorandum was written on August 10, 2019, by an unnamed unit manager at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
